# ods-status



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                           | Type                                                   | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `label`       | `label`        | A descriptor which appears above the visual status indicator.         | `string`                                               | `undefined` |
| `labelHidden` | `label-hidden` | Visually hides the label.                                             | `boolean`                                              | `undefined` |
| `role`        | `role`         | Describes the visual variant (color) used for the status indicator.   | `"alert" \| "log" \| "marquee" \| "status" \| "timer"` | `undefined` |
| `value`       | `value`        | The human-readable displayed aloing side the visual status indicator. | `string`                                               | `undefined` |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | Describes the visual variant for the Status.                          | `"caution" \| "danger" \| "neutral" \| "success"`      | `undefined` |
